name: Performer's Companion Vol. II
entries: This tome contains the secrets to performance and writing.
It can be read over 1 week to grant a creature a {@dice 1d8} to one roll during their downtime
Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Artist, Journalism, Performance, or Cook Wage Progression by 2
Once this book has been used in this way 3 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
